Content.Data:
==Applies To==
* PCI DSS Requirement 10.7
==Policy Statement==
Keep logs for at least one year.
==Policy Purpose==
Keep logs for at least one year to be able to investigate past events.
==Related Guidance==
* [[4da510f9-d288-4819-bb90-b1d7dfe55c06|Keep Logs for At Least One Year]]
==Related Checklist Items==
* [[3c2c2265-4281-4d0a-9fa5-c0a37c6bb05c|Logs Are Kept for At Least One Year]]
